Name: Rum & Raisin Espresso Martini
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
22.5 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
10 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of coffee beans and skewered raisins.
Garnish with 3 coffee beans floated on surface and skewered raisins.
Review: A hint of Pedro Ximénez sherry adds the raisin notes to this rum-based riff on Dick Bradsell 's Espresso Martini .
Nutrition: One serving of Rum & Raisin Espresso Martini contains 186 calories
